name: Bender Font Everywhere!
description:
Pretty much this https://userstyles.org/styles/59165/ubuntu-font-everywhere

but with Bender replacing it.

Bender font: http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/bender
additional_info: This is a global style and affects every webpage as well as the browser font (browser font change only on Firefox/Waterfox)
